Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
you have soul eater 100% less temporal chains curse effect
10% reduced Attributes 40% increased Global Defences +15% to all maximum resistances/ +10% to all resistances/
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 49% increased Maximum Energy Shield from Equipped Gloves and Boots defences
50% reduced damage/ nearby enemies have -12% to chaos resistance/ 50% increased damage/ nearby enemies have brittle
